Effect of Exchange Rate Changes: effect of exchange rate on cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents

Net Cash from Financing Activities: net cash provided by used in financing activities
Other Financing Activities: net proceeds from financing arrangement for sale of facility
payment for contingent consideration liability financing activities
payments for acquisition of noncontrolling interest
payments for proceeds from derivative instrument financing activities
payments related to tax withholding for share based compensation
proceeds from payments to minority shareholders
Proceeds from Debt: proceeds from issuance of long term debt
proceeds from repayments of bank overdrafts
Proceeds from Stock Issuance: excess tax benefit from share based compensation financing activities
proceeds from issuance of shares under incentive and share based compensation plans including stock options
Repayment of Debt: repayments of debt including premiums paid
repayments on financing arrangement for sale of facility
Stock Repurchases: payments for repurchase of common stock

Acquisitions (net of cash acquired): business acquisition contingent consideration cash payment
payments to acquire business two net of cash acquired
payments to acquire businesses net of cash acquired
payments to acquire interest in subsidiaries and affiliates
Capital Expenditures: payments to acquire other productive assets
payments to acquire property plant and equipment
Net Cash from Investing Activities: net cash provided by used in investing activities
Other Investing Activities: payments to acquire in process research and development operating activities
proceeds from sale of property plant and equipment
proceeds from sale of strategic investments and long lived assets
proceeds from sale of property plant and equipment
Purchases of Investments: payments to acquire available for sale securities debt
payments to acquire equity method investments
Sales and Maturities of Investments: proceeds from sale and maturity of available for sale securities
proceeds from sale of equity method investments
proceeds from sale of other investments

Net Change in Cash: cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents period increase decrease excluding exchange rate effect

Changes in Operating Assets and Liabilit: increase decrease in accrued income taxes payable
increase decrease in due from related parties
increase decrease in due from unconsolidated joint business
increase decrease in equity securities fv ni
increase decrease in other operating assets
increase decrease in other operating capital net
Net Cash from Operating Activities: net cash provided by used in operating activities
Net Income: income loss from individually significant component disposed of or held for sale excluding discontinued operations attributable to parent before income tax

equity method investment realized gain loss on disposal
equity securities fv ni unrealized gain loss
fair value adjustment of contingent consideration

gains losses on sales of assets
